#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ int i,t,k,l,flag;
	string s1,s2;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	getchar();
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>s1;
	cin>>s2;
	k=s1.length();
	l=s2.length();
	if(k!=l)
	cout<<"0"<<endl;
	else
	{
		int arr[12]={0},brr[12]={0};
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		    {
				arr[s1[i]-'0']++;
				brr[s2[i]-'0']++;
			}
 
			flag = 1;
			for( i=0;i<12;i++ )
				if(arr[i]!=brr[i] ) 
				{
					flag = 0;
					break;
				}
				if(flag==1)
		cout<<"1"<<endl;
  		else 
  		cout<<"0"<<endl;
	}
   }
   return 0;
    
}
